name: The Last Sheepdog
description:
Guide the Last Sheepdog as she travels the world rounding up sheep so she can have friends.

Made with the Pico-8 color palette for aesthetic reasons!

Edit: I have uploaded a version that more clearly displays the controls. They are WASD to move (or arrow keys) and ‘B’ to bark. Thanks to everyone for the feedback on the controls, and I hope everyone can now enjoy!
